documents.title: Income tax
documents.summary: Income tax is a tax you pay on your earnings - find out about what it is, how you pay and how to check you're paying the right amount using HMRC's tax calculator

documents.title: Update 4: AAIB investigation into the loss of aircraft N264DB
documents.summary: The AAIB is investigating the loss of an aircraft north of Guernsey.

documents.title: Proposed new timetable for State Pension age increases
documents.summary: The governmentâ€™s review proposes a new timetable for the rise to 68, in line with continuing increases in life expectancy.

documents.title: LPC welcomes acceptance of its 2019 minimum wage rate recommendations
documents.summary: Bryan Sanderson, Chair of the Low Pay Commission (LPC), today welcomed the Government's announcement that it has accepted in full the recommendations the LPC made for future minimum wage rates.

documents.title: MOT rule changes: 20 May 2018
documents.summary: The MOT test changed on 20 May 2018, with new defect types, stricter rules for diesel car emissions, and some vehicles over 40 years old becoming exempt.

documents.title: UK and Faroe Islands sign trade continuity agreement
documents.summary: The UK has signed a new trade continuity agreement with the Faroe Islands.

documents.title: One of the largest mental health trials launches in schools
documents.summary: Up to 370 schools to join one of the largest trials in the world to boost the evidence about what works to support mental health and wellbeing

documents.title: Free helplines for Universal Credit claimants
documents.summary: From today (29 November 2017) all Universal Credit telephone lines are Freephone numbers.

documents.title: Hiring a vehicle
documents.summary: If you are going on holiday and hiring a vehicle, or you are a company hiring out vehicles, these changes may affect you.

documents.title: HM Revenue and Customs simplifies importing from the EU as part of 'no deal' preparation
documents.summary: HMRC announces Transitional Simplified Procedures for customs, should we leave the EU without a deal, by writing to 145,000 VAT registered businesses trading with the EU.

documents.title: Check and update your charity details
documents.summary: All registered charities in England and Wales will need to check and update their details before they can submit an annual return.

documents.title: Joint statement on behalf of the Prime Minister and President Juncker
documents.summary: Prime Minister Theresa May met President Juncker in Brussels.

documents.title: Government outlines no deal arrangements for EU citizens
documents.summary: In the event of no deal, EU citizens will be able to enter the UK to visit, work or study after 29 March 2019.

documents.title: Class 4 defect information: Amoxicillin 500mg Capsules BP (MDR 92-12/18)
documents.summary: Accord Healthcare Limited has informed us that that a change to the Patient Information Leaflet (PIL) for\r\nthis product has not been implemented by the required timeline.

documents.title: HMRC warns on tax refund scams
documents.summary: Fraudsters are sending scam emails and SMS-messages that promise tax rebates to trick people into disclosing their account and personal details.

documents.title: 7 tips for motorists to stay safe online
documents.summary: With new online scams cropping up all the time, motorists have increasingly become a target for fraudsters.

documents.title: New advice for travellers visiting the UK, EU or European Economic Area in the event of a no-deal EU Exit
documents.summary: The government has published its latest advice for people travelling to the UK, European Union, European Economic Area or Switzerland after 29 March 2019.

documents.title: Letters on 'no deal' Brexit advice for businesses only trading with the EU
documents.summary: HMRC letters to VAT-registered businesses only trading with the EU explaining how to prepare for changes to customs, excise and VAT if the UK leaves the EU without a deal.

documents.title: Defence in Global Britain
documents.summary: Defence Secretary Gavin Williamson gave a speech at RUSI outlining the future direction of the UK Armed Forces.

documents.title: Dart Charge: Dartford Crossing remote payment
documents.summary: Dart Charge: new payment arrangements are now in place.

documents.title: Charitable think tank warned over breaches of charity law
documents.summary: Charity Commission issues formal legal warning against Institute of Economic Affairs
